mapper.sql: id, `session`, time_id, is_full, create_name, create_time, update_name, update_time
mapper.insert:
insert into memberships (id, user_id, `type`, expiry_date, is_expiry, create_name, create_time, update_name, update_time) values
(#{item.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.session,jdbcType=DATE}, #{item.timeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.updateName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
